Plot: A very rich and successful playboy amuses himself by stealing artwork, but may have met his match in a seductive detective.
Title: The Thomas Crown Affair
Writer: Alan Trustman (story), Leslie Dixon (screenplay), Kurt Wimmer (screenplay)
Actors: Pierce Brosnan, Rene Russo, Denis Leary, Ben Gazzara
tomatoConsensus: Sleek, stylish, and painlessly diverting, The Thomas Crown Affair is a remake of uncommon charm.
